name: LEGO WITH MY DAD
description:
LEGO WITH MY DAD
Made using the Unity x Lego microgame, and with man in a suit from studio new punch

LEGO WITH MY DAD

in this hit lego game you play legos with my dad, please don't make him angry and pleas e play the game, if you want to stop playing you need to say sorry, if you fail you need to say sorry, if you succeed please play again

maybe dont play this one with kids
